entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing workloads fails when using rollback files with workloads that only exist in a previous band #24368
  • Add --force-english-output switch to dotnet list package #24356
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22161.14] latest build breaks WinForms/WPF apps #24355

Closed

  • ReadyToRun publishing fails in 6.0 due to NETSDK1095 #20701

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24367
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version for API Compat to the 4.0.x stable package #24362
    Area-Compatibility
  • Improve error message for the case when Crossgen2 package is not present #24324
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Add job dependency on source build #24366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx]Add job dependency on source build #24365
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Add job dependency on source build #24364
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add job dependency on source build #24363
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve loading of Roslyn assemblies on validate package task (#22277) #24339

Updated

  • Switch away from expiring helix queues #24078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24308
    Area-Infrastructure
